DESCRIPTION:
- This command will drop 3 cards and can be used every 8 minutes.
- Use the command "sdn" to drop cards without images. This is helpful to preserve mobile data or to avoid lag.
EXTRA_DROP_ALERT: {{author}} Your **Extra Drop** is being used. You have`{{remaining}}` remaining.
BUY_DROP:
You can also `Vote` to receive `Wists` and buy `Drops` with them!
Use the command `sbuy drop <amount>` to do so
